sections.heading: of taxes; entry on tax list of refunds
sections.text: When the county treasurer refunds taxes pursuant to authority provided by law, he or she shall enter opposite such taxes in the tax list the words Erroneously taxed — refunded.SourceLaws 1903, c. 73, § 162, p. 447;R.S.1913, § 6491;C.S.1922, § 6018;C.S.1929, § 7

77-1734.Collection of taxes; entry on tax list of refunds.

When the county treasurer refunds taxes pursuant to authority provided by law, he or she shall enter opposite such taxes in the tax list the words Erroneously taxed — refunded.

SourceLaws 1903, c. 73, § 162, p. 447;R.S.1913, § 6491;C.S.1922, § 6018;C.S.1929, § 77-1923;R.S.1943, § 77-1734;Laws 1955, c. 297, § 1, p. 931;Laws 2002, LB 994, § 23.
